episodes.title: Episode 1: The Printer Revolt
episodes.description: The printers in Building B go on strike. Chaos ensues.

episodes.title: Episode 2: Breakroom Showdown
episodes.description: A turf war breaks out over the last bag of chips.

episodes.title: Episode 1: The Neon Trap
